titles.title: Since Long Ago At Bethany we parted

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
(Tune - Danny Boy)
Since long ago at Bethany we parted
Within my heart there is a ceaseless void
How can I take my harp down from the willow
How can my songs without Thee be enjoyed

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And when at night I'm keeping lonely vigil
Grown numb alike to sorrow and to cheer
Then I recall the promise of Thy coming
But sigh oh Lord why
why Thou dost not yet appear

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Thy manger wakes the thought
I too am homeless
Thy cross strips earthly
pleasures from my soul
Thy coming bids me seek
A better country
For Thou Thyself art now my final goal

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Since Thou art gone
My joy has lost its flavor
My song the sweetness
I would fain convey
Since Thou art gone
The sense of void o'erwhelms me
Oh how I long
That Thou wilt come
And not delay

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Though even now I know
Thy loving presence
Yet in my heart
There's still a sense of lack
Enlightening and tenderest sustaining
Can no more satisfy
I want Thee back

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Despite Thy peace within
I still feel lonely
Despite Thy joy there still remains a sigh
When I feel most content the silent yearning
To see Thee face to face
Becomes an uttered cry

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
What exile cannot
But desire his homeland
And long his people
Once again to greet
What soul on alien soil forgets his kindred
What parted lovers never yearn to meet

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Oh Lord how can
These earthly loves and pleasures
With all the joy of Thy return compare
Then if I cannot
here behold thy countenance
What can I do but sigh
Till Thou my Lord appear

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Could'st Thou oh Lord
Forget Thy word of promise
Soon to return
And take me unto Thee
Yet day by day
And year by year I've waited
And still I wait
And no return I see

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Remember Lord
the years I have been waiting
While Thy dear footsteps linger far away
How long - How long -
oh must I wait still longer
Till Thou shalt come
again in glorious array

verse.name: v6a
verse.lines:
From generation unto generation
Thy saints have come and gone
But have not seen
Thy glorious promise pass into fulfilment
How long - how very long the time has been

verse.name: v6b
verse.lines:
Why cannot we dear Lord
Discern Thy footsteps
Why are the heavens still
So closely sealed
Oh must our waiting be prolonged still further
Before Thou in Thy
Matchless splendor art revealed

verse.name: v7a
verse.lines:
Lord I recall the many
Years I've waited
For Thy return
Yet Lord not I alone
But Thy dear saints
through many generations
Beseeching Thee to come back for Thine own

verse.name: v7b
verse.lines:
To countless tears
and countless fervent pleadings
By Thine appearing haste to make reply
Oh may Thou come
The echo of the ages
Come - Come and answer now this
mighty corp'rate cry
